basic.description:
An extension of core acting skills and an opportunity to develop an appreciation for performance through the medium of mask.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36G;36Pc;36P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Performing with Masks

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    Level 3 and (a grade of B- in DRAM237) and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-plan, or STSC Spec. Plan).
